body: @bizley do not forget the template files itself.

issue.title: Making migration generator generate namespaced migrations

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | ✔️
| New feature?  | ❌
| Breaks BC?    | ❌
| Tests pass?   | ✔️
| Fixed issues  | #17437 

This allows generator to understand camelcased commands.

1. Namespaced class name is generated according to namespaced format `M<YYMMDDHHMMSS><Name>` where `Name` is camelized version of what is provided for generator.
2. Table names provided for generator are underscored in migration (so `User` is `user`, `MyData` is `my_data`, and `BOB` is `b_o_b` unless the name is preceded with underscore (for BC) then name case is kept as-is.
3. If table name should be suffixed with underscore you must use two underscores for generator.
4. Unintentional change but I don't want to fight it - now you can run generator with any mix of cases and/or underscores separating command words like `create_userTable`, `CreateUsertabLE` and so on. In guide I'm using official format every time.
5. Guide is updated for this (also PL version is added).

issue.title: Migration templates do not work with namespaced migrations when migration name does not include namespace

labels.name: status:ready for adoption
labels.description: Feel free to implement this issue.
